google_play_reviews.content: Minetest is great! This android port isn't. Minetest is an open source game engine that runs custom games written in lua. It's more like roblox than minecraft, in that regard. One custom game, Nodecore, is *very* worth a look. This client is a pretty direct port of the desktop version, with some touch controls slapped on. It doesn't appear to recognize my hardware controller buttons at all. The touch controls are clunky at best, too.

I have no idea why, but everytime I create or enter a world everything is just completely black and I can't see where I am going. Maybe it's my phone specs idk, the games says it runs at 60fps though.

This is a great game. Though not Minecraft, It's similar to Minecraft. What people aren't realizing while rating this is that one of the main reasons for this to exist is for developers mod this. My team is using this for personal use, as a Minecraft Java will soon require a Microsoft and this is a great start. In somr ways, most notably World generation, I personally think it is better than Minecraft. Not on everything, but It's good enough for my needs. Thank you Minetest developers

CONS * Not nearly as polished as MC * Not as much support/community as MC PROS * open source * Easily moddable * Mobile and pc can play on THE SAME SERVER * Runs faster than MC * FREE (as in FREEDOM) * Online play is way easier/simpler. Modpacks can be created easily and automatically download/install, which means you don't need special launchers or clunky interfaces that take forever to load. Overall, great game. Highly recommend.

google_play_reviews.replyContent: Try opting in to the beta (bottom of the store page), this should be fixed! The beta will become production in a few days -rubenwardy

google_play_reviews.content: Returned after 4 years and the nostalgia is immense. I remember all the times I played with my friends on all these servers. Amazing game! Will never forget..

google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the review. This is intentional, you're meant to download content for Minetest. Minetest is not a game, it's a game engine. You can find content in the Content tab. If you want a more complete game for Minetest, you can try downloading NodeCore, Repixture, or Mineclone2 from that tab -rubenwardy
